ProjectTitle: New therapeutic targets in the dimerization modes that drive androgen receptor functioning
InitialFeedbackHistory:
28/07/2022
3. Ethics: Since you work with animal models there are ethical issues and if you use human cells these need registration at the UZL ethics committee, for more information see www.kuleuven.be/english/research/associatienet/ethics/index. Please update your DMP to include the approval number(s).
4. Documentation/Metadata: please note that GEO is an NCBI repository, not from EMBL; they use MINSEQE based metadata, but other standards in the MIBBI collection may also be interesting for your work, see https://fairsharing.org/3518. For microscopy OME (https://fairsharing.org/FAIRsharing.cq8tg2) is often used and for protein crystallography CIF (https://fairsharing.org/FAIRsharing.zr52g5);  for reporting of animal experiments ARRIVE is recommended by many journals (https://arriveguidelines.org/)
label: intermediate DMP needed
